messages.title: WE HAVE 24 HOURS TO SAVE OUR NHS
messages.content: Staying at home or voting for any other party will let the Tories win.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs
Guarantee cancer tests and results within one week

issues.health: LABOUR WILL: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, Guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours, Guarantee cancer tests and results within one week.

quotes.text: THE TORIES ARE A THREAT TO OUR NHS: Worst A&E crisis on record. Extreme cuts which threaten the survival of our NHS. Waiting lists at their highest levels for six years.

images.caption: An ambulance themed campaign leaflet with Labour Party policies for NHS alongside criticism of the Conservative Party's record.
